description: Mongo Backed REST API ========================== To complete this assignment:   * fork this repository (the sub module for this specific assignment)   * clone down your fork   * place all of your work in a folder that is your full name, use `_`s instead of spaces   * push back up to your fork   * create a pull request back to the original repo   * submit a link to the PR in canvas
